articles.author: Christopher Rugaber
articles.title: US consumer prices soared 6.2% in past year, most since 1990 - Associated Press
articles.description: WASHINGTON (AP) — American households have been struggling with accelerating inflation for months. On Wednesday, the government spelled out just how much they have. Prices for U.S. consumers jumped 6.2% in October compared with a year earlier as surging costs…

articles.author: Dan Gelernter
articles.title: Life Without the Vaccine › American Greatness - American Greatness
articles.description: When the vaccine first came out, I wasn’t too eager to get it. I’m young and healthy. Statistics indicated that I was unlikely to get COVID and extremely unlikely to get a serious case of it.
